title: Wasp Gun
summaries: The Wasp Gun is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that, as a direct upgrade of the Bee Gun, autofires homing wasp projectiles that damage and pierce enemies.

• On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, the Wasp Gun fires 2–4 wasps that ricochet or pierce enemies a maximum of three times before dissipating. The Wasp Gun also has 10 armor penetration, and its wasp projectiles cause static immunity frames.
  • On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Wasp Gun fires 2–6 wasps that ricochet or pierce enemies a maximum of four times before dissipating. The Wasp Gun cannot inflict any knockback, and its wasp projectiles cause global immunity frames.
The Wasp Gun has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being dropped by Plantera.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Its best modifier is Mythical.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Its best modifier is Demonic or Deadly for damage output, or Mystic for mana conservation because it cannot get modifiers that affect knockback.
